mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_MNSHAHODINFSGMT set MNSHARHODNM = #{MnSharHodNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGCAPCURRENCY = #{RegCapCurrency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REGCAP = #{RegCap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MNSHAHODINFOUPDATE = #{MnShaHodInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ReportFlag=#{ReportFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO = #{MnShaHodInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO, MNSHARHODNM, REGCAPCURRENCY, REGCAP, MNSHAHODINFOUPDATE,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_MNSHAHODINFSGMT
